text: Azenir 4pla gɨvazɨma,15:7 Hibrun akam ghaze, 40plan azeniba. Ezɨ fomɨra gumazir maba akar kam Grighɨn akamɨn a gɨra, egha ghaze, akar kam a 4plan azenibav gei. Apsalom ghua kamaghɨn Atrivim Devit mɨgei, “Ga uaning, nɨ na teghtɨma kɨ uamategh Hebronɨn mangɨ, akar dɨkɨrɨzir kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God gamizir mam damightɨ, an otoka.
